The mystery of the temple and city described in the nine last chapters of Ezekiel unfolded ... by William Alleine ... Alleine, William, 1614-1677.
[5], 290 p.
Printed for B. Harris and are to be sold ... by T. Wall, London : 1679.
Earlier ed. published in 1677 without second part. In 2 parts: each part has separate t.p. Title of 2nd part: Some discovery of the new heavens and the new earth / by William Alleine. London : for Benjamin Haris, 1679 (pp. 1-188) Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
